General.Name: InnoTec TSS AG
General.Description: InnoTec TSS AG, through its subsidiaries, produces and sells exterior door panels for the construction industry in Germany, Europe, and internationally. The company provides aluminum, steel, and plastic door panels; door glazing; and glass products for front doors, interior doors, windows, furniture, and other architectural elements. It also offers elastic matrices, molds, liquid plastics, and elastic structured formliners for use in precast concrete plants and in-situ concrete. InnoTec TSS AG is based in Düsseldorf, Germany.
